laboratory_examinations.findings: The hepatic parenchyma appears within normal limits. The contour of the liver is smooth. No focal liver mass. The main portal vein is patent with hepatopetal flow. No ascites. CBD measures 4 mm. Gallstones and sludge layer dependently in the gallbladder. The gallbladder is distended. No pericholecystic fluid or wall edema. The patient is maximally focally tender with ultrasound pressure over the gallbladder.
